name: Deep Web The Game
description:
DEEP WEB THE GAME:

                                                            

WARNING:

The game optimization is prototype and still in progress, this may cause your pc to slow down while the game is open and about 2 minutes after closing the game.

Very detalied, deep web horror, explore, sandbox, survival game.

You will totally experience the thriller and horror inside you.

Some of the websites that take place in game, may be real .onion links but censored.

Follow us for more updates.

STATUS:
  • Alpha Status: dwdg-0.1.6-a
  • Beta Status: none
  • Current Version Status: dwdg-0.1.6-a
  • Shared Version Status: dwdg-0.1.6-a

[From The Best]

[Much more details per week or month.]

FAQ: IS THERE IS GOING TO BE ANY SHARED ALPHA OR BETA VERSIONS?:

Yes, the alpha and beta test versions will be shared with you for your important opinions and advice.

WHAT IS THE SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS?:

The game engine is pretty bad on optimization, so you we recommend you to have this computer stats at minimum,

Windows Version: Windows 7/8/10 - 32/64 Bit

Ram: 4GB RAM

CPU: 2.6 GHz Quad Core CPU

Screen Card: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850 or better

Required Space: 310 MB

WHO IS THE CREATOR OF THIS?:

The developer and creator of this game is anonymous, there is only one person behind this.

WHEN WILL GAME IS GOING TO BE PUBLISHED, AND WHY?:

This game project is unsure of it's release date, this game project will be updated every week or month and developed a new version until the second game is announced. Like as i say;

Longer time, longer experience.

IS THE GAME IS GOING TO BE FREE2PLAY?:

Yes, but not the second one. We are thinking about; the first game will be totally free to play and accepting any donates. As long as your donation support is enough for progress, we will make the second game free to play too.

Please leave a comment or topic for more information.
